# Import and data description

```{r importation}
urchin <- read("urchin_bio", package = "data.io")
```

These data contain 19 variable measurements on *Paracentrotus lividus*. This animal is an urchin. Individuals come from fishery (Brittany, France) and from a sea urchins farm in Normandy (France).
